channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17978] Shared work optimizer may leave useless operator branches in the plan
item.description:
Failed with the following Exception 


 ERROR [6c707c4e-2849-4ff2-809d-946581e6b83a HiveServer2-Handler-Pool: Thread-78] ql.Driver: FAILED: SemanticException org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException: The column KEY._col0 is not in the vectorization context column map {_col0=0}.
org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.SemanticException: org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException: The column KEY._col0 is not in the vectorization context column map {_col0=0}.

item.summary: Shared work optimizer may leave useless operator branches in the plan

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
In a follow-up we shall allow merging of 2 TSs both of which have semijoin branch.
Also, we should consider running sharedwork optimizer after semijoin branches are removed.

+1 overall

ashutoshc i meet the same issue in hive2.1，but i don't know whether  it has been fixed in branch 2? SharedWorkOptimizer does not exists in hive2.1
